trans-unit.source: Specifies the data type of a field or property for use in an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de dados de um campo ou propriedade para utilização num <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows mappings between OracleType data types, Oracle data types, and .NET Framework types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra mapeamentos entre tipos de dados de OracleType, tipos de dados Oracle e tipos de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> data type that contains a reference to binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes that is stored in an external file.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma referência a dados binários com um tamanho máximo de 4 gigabytes que é armazenado num ficheiro externo.

trans-unit.source: Use the OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> data type with the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> do tipo de dados com o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BLOB" name="BLOB" href=""></xref> data type that contains binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BLOB" name="BLOB" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém os dados binários com um tamanho máximo de 4 gigabytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing unsigned 8-bit integers with values between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa sem sinal de 8 bits de números inteiros com valores entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Byte> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Byte>tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Byte> de.NET Framework

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_CHAR" name="CHAR" href=""></xref> data type that contains a fixed-length character string with a maximum size of 2,000 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_CHAR" name="CHAR" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma cadeia de carateres de comprimento fixo com um tamanho máximo de bytes 2.000.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""></xref> data type that contains character data, based on the default character set on the server, with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_CLOB" name="CLOB" href=""> </xref> definir o tipo de dados que contém dados de carateres, com base no caráter predefinida no servidor, com um tamanho máximo de 4 gigabytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_REF CURSOR" name="REF CURSOR" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"></xref> object is not available.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader"> </xref> o objeto não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_DATE" name="DATE" href=""></xref> data type that contains a fixed-length representation of a date and time, ranging from January 1, 4712 B.C.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_DATE" name="DATE" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma representação de comprimento fixo de uma data e hora, 1 de Janeiro de 4712 B.C.

trans-unit.source: to December 31, A.D.
trans-unit.target: para o 31 de Dezembro de A.D.

trans-unit.source: 4712, with the default format *dd-mmm-yy*.
trans-unit.target: 4712, com o formato predefinido *dd-mmm-aa*.

trans-unit.source: For A.D.
trans-unit.target: Para A.D.

trans-unit.source: dates, <xref uid="langword_csharp_DATE" name="DATE" href=""></xref> maps to <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: as datas, <xref uid="langword_csharp_DATE" name="DATE" href=""> </xref> mapeia para <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To bind B.C.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular B.C.

trans-unit.source: dates, use a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> parameter and the Oracle TO_DATE or TO_CHAR conversion functions for input and output parameters respectively.
trans-unit.target: as datas, utilize um <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> parâmetro e as Oracle TO_DATE TO_CHAR conversão funções ou de entrada e saída parâmetros, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de vírgula flutuante de dupla precisão.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For information about conversion of Oracle numeric values to common language runtime (CLR) data types, see <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a conversão de valores numéricos Oracle para tipos de dados de runtime (CLR) de idioma comum, consulte <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Double> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Double>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de vírgula flutuante de precisão simples.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For information about conversion of Oracle numeric values to common language runtime data types, see <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a conversão de valores numéricos Oracle para tipos de dados de tempo de execução de idioma comum, consulte <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Single> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Single>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing signed 16-bit integers with values between -32768 and 32767.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa iniciou a sessão de números inteiros de 16 bits com valores entre -32768 e 32767.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For information about conversion of Oracle numeric values to common language runtime (CLR) data types, see <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a conversão de valores numéricos Oracle para tipos de dados de runtime (CLR) de idioma comum, consulte <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Int16> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Int16>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing signed 32-bit integers with values between -2147483648 and 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa iniciou a sessão de números inteiros de 32 bits com valores entre -2147483648 e 2147483647.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided for performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For information about conversion of Oracle numeric values to common language runtime data types, see <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a conversão de valores numéricos Oracle para tipos de dados de tempo de execução de idioma comum, consulte <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND" name="INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND" href=""></xref> data type (Oracle 9i or later) that contains an interval of time in days, hours, minutes, and seconds, and has a fixed size of 11 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND" name="INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados (Oracle 9i ou posterior) que contém um intervalo de tempo em dias, horas, minutos e segundos e tem um tamanho fixo de 11 bytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.TimeSpan> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTimeSpan"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.TimeSpan>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTimeSpan"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH" name="INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH" href=""></xref> data type (Oracle 9i or later) that contains an interval of time in years and months, and has a fixed size of 5 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH" name="INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados (Oracle 9i ou posterior) que contém um intervalo de tempo em anos e meses e tem um tamanho fixo de 5 bytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleMonthSpan"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleMonthSpan"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LONGRAW" name="LONGRAW" href=""></xref> data type that contains variable-length binary data with a maximum size of 2 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LONGRAW" name="LONGRAW" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém dados binários de comprimento variável com um tamanho máximo de 2 gigabytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""></xref> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""> </xref> ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When you update a column with the `LONG RAW` data type, an exception is thrown when you enter a value of `NULL` in the column.
trans-unit.target: Quando atualizar uma coluna com o `LONG RAW` tipo de dados, é emitida uma exceção ao introduzir um valor de `NULL` na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `LONG RAW` data type is a deprecated type in Oracle version 8.0.
trans-unit.target: O Oracle `LONG RAW` tipo de dados é um tipo preterido no Oracle versão 8.0.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this error, use the `BLOB` data type instead of `LONG RAW`.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este erro, utilize o `BLOB` do tipo de dados em vez de `LONG RAW`.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LONG" name="LONG" href=""></xref> data type that contains a variable-length character string with a maximum size of 2 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_LONG" name="LONG" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma cadeia de carateres de comprimento variável com um tamanho máximo de 2 gigabytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCHAR" name="NCHAR" href=""></xref> data type that contains fixed-length character string to be stored in the national character set of the database, with a maximum size of 2,000 bytes (not characters) when stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCHAR" name="NCHAR" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém a cadeia de carateres de comprimento fixo para ser armazenado no conjunto de carateres national da base de dados, com um máximo de tamanho de bytes 2.000 (não carateres) quando armazenados na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: The size of the value depends on the national character set of the database.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do valor depende o conjunto de carateres national da base de dados.

trans-unit.source: See your Oracle documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a documentação do Oracle para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""></xref> data type that contains character data to be stored in the national character set of the database, with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes (not characters) when stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NCLOB" name="NCLOB" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém dados de carateres para ser armazenado no conjunto de carateres national da base de dados, com um máximo de tamanho de 4 gigabytes (não carateres) quando armazenados na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: The size of the value depends on the national character set of the database.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do valor depende o conjunto de carateres national da base de dados.

trans-unit.source: See your Oracle documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a documentação do Oracle para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NUMBER" name="NUMBER" href=""></xref> data type that contains variable-length numeric data with a maximum precision and scale of 38.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NUMBER" name="NUMBER" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém dados numéricos de comprimento variável com uma precisão máxima e a escala de 38.

trans-unit.source: This maps to <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: Isto mapeia para <xref:System.Decimal>.</xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: To bind an Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NUMBER" name="NUMBER" href=""></xref> that exceeds what <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue> can contain, either use an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type, or use a <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> parameter and the Oracle TO_NUMBER or TO_CHAR conversion functions for input and output parameters respectively.
trans-unit.target: Vincular um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NUMBER" name="NUMBER" href=""> </xref> que excede o <xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>pode conter, utilize um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados ou utilize um <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> parâmetro e as Oracle TO_NUMBER TO_CHAR conversão funções ou de entrada e saída parâmetros, respetivamente.</xref:System.Decimal.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.Decimal> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.Decimal>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NVARCHAR2" name="NVARCHAR2" href=""></xref> data type that contains a variable-length character string stored in the national character set of the database, with a maximum size of 4,000 bytes (not characters) when stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_NVARCHAR2" name="NVARCHAR2" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma cadeia de carateres de comprimento variável armazenada no conjunto de carateres national da base de dados, com um máximo de tamanho de 4 000 bytes (não carateres) quando armazenados na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: The size of the value depends on the national character set of the database.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho do valor depende o conjunto de carateres national da base de dados.

trans-unit.source: See your Oracle documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a documentação do Oracle para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_RAW" name="RAW" href=""></xref> data type that contains variable-length binary data with a maximum size of 2,000 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_RAW" name="RAW" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém dados binários de comprimento variável com um tamanho máximo de bytes 2.000.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""></xref> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref uid="langword_csharp_Byte[]" name="Byte[]" href=""> </xref> ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBinary"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The base64 string representation of an Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_ROWID" name="ROWID" href=""></xref> data type.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia base64 de um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_ROWID" name="ROWID" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.String> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.String>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleString"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing signed 8 bit integers with values between -128 and 127.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa iniciou a sessão de números inteiros de 8 bits com valores entre -128 e 127.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.SByte> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.SByte>tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.SByte> de.NET Framework

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP" name="TIMESTAMP" href=""></xref> (Oracle 9i or later) that contains date and time (including seconds), and ranges in size from 7 to 11 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP" name="TIMESTAMP" href=""> </xref> (Oracle 9i ou posterior) que contém a data e hora (incluindo segundos) e intervalos de tamanho de 7 bytes 11.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE" name="TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE" href=""></xref> (Oracle 9i or later) that contains date, time, and a reference to the original time zone, and ranges in size from 7 to 11 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE" name="TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIMEZONE" href=""> </xref> (Oracle 9i ou posterior) que contém a data, hora e uma referência para o fuso horário original e intervalos de tamanho de 7 bytes 11.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP WITH TIMEZONE" name="TIMESTAMP WITH TIMEZONE" href=""></xref> (Oracle 9i or later) that contains date, time, and a specified time zone, and has a fixed size of 13 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TIMESTAMP WITH TIMEZONE" name="TIMESTAMP WITH TIMEZONE" href=""> </xref> (Oracle 9i ou posterior) que contém a data, hora e um fuso horário especificado e tem um tamanho fixo de 13 bytes.

trans-unit.source: Use the .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> or OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDateTime"></xref> data type in <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing unsigned 16-bit integers with values between 0 and 65535.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa sem sinal de 16 bits de números inteiros com valores entre 0 e 65535.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For information about conversion of Oracle numeric values to common language runtime (CLR) data types, see <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre a conversão de valores numéricos Oracle para tipos de dados de runtime (CLR) de idioma comum, consulte <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Utilize o .NET Framework <xref:System.UInt16>ou OracleClient <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber"> </xref> tipo de dados no <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter.Value*> </xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: An integral type representing unsigned 32-bit integers with values between 0 and 4294967295.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo integral que representa sem sinal de 32 bits de números inteiros com valores entre 0 e 4294967295.

trans-unit.source: This is not a native Oracle data type, but is provided to improve performance when binding input parameters.
trans-unit.target: Não é um tipo de dados Oracle nativo, mas é fornecido para melhorar o desempenho quando se vincula a parâmetros de entrada.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARCHAR2" name="VARCHAR2" href=""></xref> data type that contains a variable-length character string with a maximum size of 4,000 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_VARCHAR2" name="VARCHAR2" href=""> </xref> tipo de dados que contém uma cadeia de carateres de comprimento variável com um tamanho máximo de 4 000 bytes.
